0: Plenty of private settings in their large lobby with very comfortable furniture and they even have a Starbucks and a Subway in their lobby for those of us that have really busy days and can not leave the hotel
Great experience location amenities friendly knowledgeable helpful staff for the most part
The beautiful atrium and soaring glass elevators swept us up to our 11th floor room
The lobby has shops restaurants and access to the convention centre via a land bridge
Bar in lobby had great food
I found on this stay that I got standard toiletries though the upgraded options on the club lounge floor were a plus face wash chapstick etc
They had a hot tub and pool and some gym equipment

Room very dark dirty wet stained wash cloths on sink at check in air conditioning did not work well bar was very nice and centrally located nice Starbucks in lobby staff eager to please especially with locations of various restaurants
The staff was friendly and the lobby was beautiful however it is not at all worth the price we paid
Close to everything nice gym customer service great super friendly nice acomdations in the lobby areas
1: Elevator was really backed up after tradeshow closed
I was in the city for a ballroom dance event in one of the conference rooms on the third floor
The fitness center had nice equipment but it had not been cleaned and there was nothing to clean it
Everything was excellent except that it takes too long for the elevators to show up
I declined and sat in the Lobby until after 30
Also the elevators were a lot of fun
2: Too many floors being serviced by 3 elevators
By the time I woke up 630am it was 75 in my room and I opened the door to the hallway to cool out the room it was much cooler in the hallway
Small beds slow elevators but great location
for the price paid for our stay i did not anticipate the charge to use the parking facilities
Elevators worked the first day but were having issues on our second day
Rooms have been refreshed as has the lobby
The bathroom was a good size and clean with nice toiletries but a little rough around the edges with slightly bubbling wallpaper in a few places and grout that needed to be refreshed
Gym is a bit small but gets the job done
The entrance was hard to get to the toilet in the room did not work the entire time when the plunger came off
There were two elevators I never saw moving
